TextEng: "Is that how you greet all your customers?"
"No protections could stop me, if I wanted to rob you."
Text: "내가 당신을 털려고 한다면, 어떤 보호장치도 날 막지 못할 텐데요."

TextEng: "How did your father lose his position?"
"Obviously your father was a trusting fool. Good thing you learned better."
Text: "분명히 당신 아버지는 믿음직한 바보였군요. 당신이 더 잘 배워서 다행이네요."

TextEng: "I was told to ask about your special items."
<StartCheck>[Intimidate]</Start> "You seem like a nice person, Argali. I'd hate to see you get hurt."
Text: <StartCheck>[위협]</Start> "좋은 사람 같아 보이는데, 아갈리. 다치는 건 보고 싶지 않네요.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> "You can tell others that the great hero <FullName> always shops here."
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> "위대한 영웅 <FullName>이 항상 여기서 물건을 산다고 다른 사람들에게 말해도 돼요.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Bluff]</Start> "I have heard rumors about some shady deals you've made. If that got out, it could hurt business."
Text: <StartCheck>[허세]</Start> "당신이 수상한 거래를 했다는 소문을 들었어요. 그게 퍼지면 장사에 나쁠 텐데요.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Insight]</Start> "How about I tell my adventuring friends how good your store is?"
Text: <StartCheck>[통찰]</Start> "제 모험가 친구들에게 당신 가게가 얼마나 좋은지 말해주면 어떨까요?

TextEng: "How much do you want for it?"
"That's too much. I won't pay it."
"I'm not sure. What do you sell here?"
"I thought a war would be good for your business."
"You should welcome a war. It will boost your profits."
Text: "전쟁을 환영해야 하는 거 아닌가요. 수익이 늘어날 텐데요."

TextEng: "You make it sound noble, but how do you know they aren't evil?"
Text: "고상하게 들리지만, 그들이 악하지 않다는 걸 어떻게 알죠?"

TextEng: "Wait a minute - are you talking about yourself in the third person?"
"Well <FullName> doesn't like stuck up merchants, so <FullName> will go away."
"I want to buy that cloak you mentioned before."
"Tell me about that cloak you mentioned before."
